name: Some Spring Help
description: A bad game made for the Spring Game Jam 2021. It's a big buggy mess, the scope was a bit too big, and the build worked almost completely different to the game in unity. The section of someone talking for some reason got completely cut out, I am completely fed up with it, I think that no one is gonna like it, it's barely even a 10 minute game (and I was working on it for 20 days), I could go on. Just try to enjoy.
